title: Lunch at School
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Lunch at School is a simple story about a common activity. Different parts of lunch are revealed in two-word sentences, while interesting illustrations brighten the story with comic and engaging characters. Use this book to teach students about connecting to prior knowledge as well as finding details that support a main idea and using nouns.
meta: bag, carrots, cookie, friends, lunch, milk, napkin, noodles
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word my
